body.p: If Show Profiling Attributes option (available in the Profiling / Conditional Text toolbar menu) is set all profiling attributes set on the current element are listed at the end of the highlighted block. Profiled text is marked in the Author mode with a light green border.
The profiled content that does not match the rules imposed by the current condition sets is grayed-out, meaning that it will not be included in the published output.
